page.title: 13FARMING
page.content: The farming in our area is mostly Arable but beef cattle are being produced.The bulls used for the beef are North Devons,which are not common in Britain. The cereals that are grown around Tilehurst are predominantly Rye but other crops such as Corn,Wheat,Barley are grown.All the Rye in Tilehurst area is used for the crisp bread Ryevita some of the oats are used for Quaker porridge oats. The farms keep North Devon bulls which they call the Devons they are red in colour and have creamy horns with black tips.Around our area the milk from Devon x cows is olny used to feed their calves not for the milk-man.Devon cattle have a nickname. they are known as {RED RUBIES!
